articles.title: California church shooter upset over Taiwan-China tensions -police - Reuters
articles.description: The man accused of killing a doctor and wounding five other people in a shooting at a Taiwanese-American church banquet in California methodically planned the attack because he was upset over Chinese-Taiwanese tensions, authorities said on Monday.

articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: See the Super Flower Blood Moon eclipse from around the world - New York Post
articles.description: Most of Europe, Africa and the US plus eastern Canada, New Zealand and the whole of South America, were able to see either a partial or full eclipse of the super flower blood moon on May 15.
articles.content:
Buddhist monks pray at the Sewu temple in Sleman, Yogyakarta, Indonesia, during Vesak, an annual celebration of Buddha's birth, enlightenment and death on May full moon day.
via REUTERS

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Black adults raised in the South have greater risk of lower cognitive performance in later life - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Black adults who grew up poor and socially disadvantaged in the American South are more likely than white adults with a similar background to suffer cognition problems later in life, according to a Rutgers study.
